column9: 1. I'd suggest rearranging the metadata section to provide a gentler introduction to metadata - perhaps cover attaching attibutes first, then move on to EML. A gentler introduction to the EML section would have been helpful for many. 2. People were flagging after two previous days on R. Perhaps data management (with extensions to github and reproducible research) should be run as standalone course?
As a complete novice to R, I found the material too challenging to follow, particularly metadata
